dc_title_s: Sanitary Gravity Mains: Stark County, Ohio
dc_description_s: Sanitary gravity mains owned and operated by the Stark County Sanitary Engineer (SCSE). A gravity main is a sanitary sewer pipe that utilizes gravity to transfer wastewater downhill. Sewer mains collect wastewater from laterals connected to residents or businesses. The attribute table includes detailed information about pipes, including pipe sizes, invert elevations, and operational status (active, abandoned, or proposed). For more information, contact:Michael A. Ciconte II, GIS Coordinator for Stark County Metro Sewer District1701 Mahoning Road N.E. Canton, Ohio 44705Phone: 330-451-2352 Fax:330-459-9044Email: maciconte@starkcountyohio.govHours of Service: 24 hours a Day - 7 Days a weekContact Instructions: You can reach the Stark County Sanitary Engineering Dept. via Phone 330-451-2303 or E-Mail scse@starkcountyohio.gov, SCGIS
